page.title: 12EVENTS IN NEWBOLD
page.content:
At the Newbold District and{Social {Club,}they have events like country and western,where people or bands sing country songs.On a Monday the club has dart matches and on a Tuesday there is pool.Every Friday,Saturday and Sunday is bingo night.At{Christmas}and{Easter the club has prize bingo for chickens, cockerels and turkeys.Every Christmas the club has a party for the kids and they get a present.
The{Christmas}events are very good{at {the school.}The children have a party and we have some games like the card game,jump the crocodile,the hat parade and things like that.then we have a party tea with party cakes,sandwiches, ice-cream and jelly.We see{Santa Claus and he gives us presents.
